name: Cube Rolling
description:
Guide your cube through the platforms avoiding obstacles by jumping and switching sides.
Cube Rolling is a crazy game that will test your coordination as you go through unpredictable and moving obstacles along the way.
Complete 50 challenging missions and collect diamonds to unlock all themes and cubes!

How to play:

Tap left to jump or switch to the left;
Tap right to jump or switch to the right;

Features:
- 4 unique themes
- 50 missions
- Fast paced & addicting gameplay
- 15+ cubes to unlock
- Compete with friends on game center leaderboards
